bid.title: Place Bid
bid.cannotBidOwn: You cannot bid on your own item.
bid.cannotBid: You cannot bid on this item.
bid.anonymousTooltip: Your name will be hidden from other bidders. The item owner will still see your details.
bid.antiSnipeInfo: Bids placed in the last {minutes, plural, =1 {1 minute} other {# minutes}} will extend the deadline by {extension, plural, =1 {1 minute} other {# minutes}}.
bid.antiSnipeInfoSeconds: Bids placed in the last {seconds} seconds will extend the deadline by {extension} seconds.

create.title: Add New Item
create.subtitle: Add an item to your auction
create.publishModalMessage: Your item has all the required information. Would you like to publish it now so other auction members can see it and place bids?
create.draftModalMessage: Some information is missing (name, description, images, price, or currency). Your item has been saved as a draft. You can publish it later from the Edit Item page once all details are complete.
create.allowAdminEdit: Allow auction admins to edit this item
create.allowAdminEditDescription: When enabled, auction admins can edit this item's details on your behalf.
create.antiSnipeEnable: Extend time when late bids arrive
create.antiSnipeEnableDescription: Automatically extends the end time if a bid is placed close to the deadline, giving other bidders a chance to respond.
create.antiSnipeThresholdHint: A bid placed within this time before the end will trigger an extension. Between 1 and 60 minutes.
create.antiSnipeExtensionHint: How much time to add to the end when triggered. Between 5 seconds and 60 minutes.
create.antiSnipeRequiresEndDate: Set an end date above to enable bid extension protection.

edit.title: Edit Item
edit.subtitle: Manage item details and settings
edit.deleteDescription: Delete this item permanently. This action cannot be undone.
edit.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
edit.endDescription: End bidding on this item immediately. No more bids will be accepted after this.
edit.confirmEnd: Are you sure you want to end bidding on "{name}"?
edit.endMessageWithBids: The current highest bidder will win this item.
edit.endMessageNoBids: This item has no bids yet.
edit.hasBidsWarning: This item has bids. Some fields cannot be changed.
edit.endedMessage: This item has already ended. Bidding is closed.
edit.cannotDeleteWithBids: Items with bids cannot be deleted.
edit.cannotChangeCurrency: Cannot change currency after bids have been placed
edit.cannotChangeStartingBid: Cannot change starting bid after bids have been placed
edit.itemsEndWithAuction: Items end when the auction ends
edit.publishedDescription: This item is visible to all auction members and can receive bids.
edit.draftDescription: This item is only visible to you. Publish it to make it visible to others.
edit.cannotUnpublishWithBids: Cannot unpublish an item that has received bids
edit.allowAdminEdit: Allow auction admins to edit this item
edit.allowAdminEditDescription: When enabled, auction admins can edit this item's details on your behalf.
edit.antiSnipeEnable: Extend time when late bids arrive
edit.antiSnipeEnableDescription: Automatically extends the end time if a bid is placed close to the deadline, giving other bidders a chance to respond.
edit.antiSnipeThresholdHint: A bid placed within this time before the end will trigger an extension. Between 1 and 60 minutes.
edit.antiSnipeExtensionHint: How much time to add to the end when triggered. Between 5 seconds and 60 minutes.

history.title: Bid History
history.noBids: No bids yet. Be the first to bid!

empty.title: No items yet
empty.description: This auction doesn't have any items listed yet.
